item.description:
We've finished our tour of Italy, but before we head west to Spain, let's welcome the arrival of spring.  What better (or more ironic) tasting focus for the month of April than the wines of the Eastern Mediterranean?  Join us for a romp through the white wines of Greece, Turkey, and Israel!

 

Volunteers to bring regional appetizers are greatly appreciated.  Running List of current volunteers and food suggestions are below.

Keftedes (lamb meatballs)--Noel

Lamb & orzo dish--Monica

Dolmadakia (stuffed grape leaves)--Celeste

tyropittakia /burekas--Eleanor P

Fattoush--Janis S

Olives--Kim P

Baba ghanoush/Pita bread--Diane S

Tzatziki & veggies--Charlie

Skordalia

Hummus

Others--pull out those cookbooks and surprise us!

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Eastern Mediterranean Whites
